vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Shunam(?), first mentioned at 1Ki.1.3
§ Shunammite = see Shunen "double resting place"
an inhabitant of Shunem
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
書念人 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 書念[7766] "倍覺安息之地"
書念地的居民
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
书念人 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 书念[7766] "倍觉安息之地"
书念地的居民
